New Records: Kylian Mbappé scored his 19th goal in 19 international games
Key Match Events: Mbappé was involved in all three goals of France's 3-0 win over Luxembourg
Pre-Game Insights: Kylian Mbappé was named captain and emphasized his determination to lead France to victory at the Euros
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps praised Mbappé's leadership and performance, highlighting his importance to the team
